name: Shimano RP3 Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Competition-grade fit housed in a cost-cutting package. The RP3 Cycling Shoes suit committed enthusiasts and club riders. Like shoes at double the price point, they have 2 offset straps and a fast-ratcheting buckle. They also deliver stellar comfort with a supple padded tongue (no hot spots) and an air intake system for a steady flow of cooling air.Durable synthetic leather and mesh upper provides breezy ventilation on hot days.2 offset hook-and-loop straps and ratchet buckle provide a sprint-ready fit.Dynalast provides a smooth and efficient upstroke.Stiff reinforced nylon sole aids power transfer on hard efforts.Compatible with 3-hole pedal systems.
